content.rendered:
Imagine waking up to the sheer bliss of lush greenery and fresh air around the year.  Presenting Gulshan Botnia, a residential project meticulously crafted to offer you the extraordinary experience of contemporary living amidst nature. This beautifully-designed project of 2 & 3 BHK homes is adorned with remarkable amenities. Situated at a sought-after location, Gulshan Botnia is everything that one looks for in their dream home.

Take a look at some of the stunning features of Gulshan Botnia:

Always be ahead of time: Positioned in a desirable location, all your lifestyle needs are only a few minutes away. Located at Sector 144 on the Noida Expressway, Gulshan Botnia ensures you enjoy easy connectivity to destinations such as:

• Faridabad
• Sector 143
• Advant Navis Business Park
• Noida Golf Course
• Kalindi Kunj
• Amity Chowk
• Sector 18
• DND Flyover

Forget boredom at Gulshan Botnia: No need to think twice about how to spend your leisure time. You will never be deprived of luxury, thanks to our wide range of extravagant amenities:

• Open Badminton Court
• Beauty Salon
• Jogging Track
• Immaculate Landscaping
• Play Pan for Kids
• Swimming Pool
• Yoga/Aerobic
• Rainwater Harvesting
• Customer Care Center
• Security
• Dedicated Lift Lobby
• Internet

Our brand value

Gulshan religiously adheres to the philosophy of ‘no compromise’. Our focus on quality, precision and perfect planning make each Gulshan project a milestone of success. A countless number of satisfied customers and timely delivery of projects make Gulshan responsible, reliable.
Gulshan Botnia truly reflects the values of its brand name and offers a hassle-free home-buying experience. If you are looking for 2 BHK flats in Noida Expressway, don’t look further than Gulshan Botnia by Gulshan’s.
